name: Dragon My Sack
description:
There was once a greedy little goblin

Who had quite the passion for robbin’

One day he crawled into a cave

And did something that sent him to the grave

He started to steal hoards of gold

But suddenly his blood ran cold

He heard a deep roar, so

The goblin turned slowly, and to his horror

A dragon stood tall and vicious

The dragon bent down and whispered…

“My my, don’t you look delicious.” 

Tutorial:

WASD - Move

E and Q - Rotate the Camera

F - Pick up coins

Space bar - drop coins

  • Enter the lair and grab as much gold from the main hoard as you can.
  • Once you hear a roar, you know the dragon is coming to get the gold you stole.
  • Run away from the dragon, if you’re moving too slow, leave some of the gold behind!
  • Put gold on each pressure plate around the edge of the cavern to unlock secret rooms.
  • One of these rooms has an exit door, but first you have to find the golden key!
  • Good luck
